# Bulk

## Methods

### bulk.find(query)

Returns `{upsert(): any, remove(): any, removeOne(): any, update(updateObj: any): any, updateOne(updateObj: any): any, replaceOne(updObj: any): any}`

### bulk.insert(doc)

Returns `void`

### bulk.tojson()

Returns `Object`

### bulk.toString()

Returns `Object`

### bulk.execute()

Returns [`Promise<any>`](https://www.promisejs.org/api/)
